author: Aalina AcTon
comment: łnstaII "VEARN" App Enterr (ALNA) to Start Earnings So far so good. Fun way to get Money. Won't make you rich but the extra cash is helpful. It's also the best exchange rate on points. vEarn points equals vc instead of like some of the others where it takes vEarn points to reach vc etc....Also, TOYOCASH App very reliable in paying you when you redeem to Paypal. You can choose assorted giftcards as payment or transfer to Paypal for cash. Your choice. I love these guys thanks for adding some fun to my day.
